name: Schema 2021 Name Badge  - Rusmir Arnautovic
description:
A senior designer and art director with around 20 years of experience in creating that pixel perfect design and a genuine product experience. I am specialised in interface design for native mobile and web-based apps. I strive to build clean, appealing and functional interfaces that comply with the latest standards.

I am currently working as a Design Team Lead by Klika. I like to spend my spare time to work on strengthening the Figma community and working on free tools and templates (my moto is "Give the community back what you have learned from the community"). Design is my life and advertising and graphics are a huge passion of mine.

But that’s just part of it. Let’s dive into the details…

MY PRESENTATION
